rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0001
rows.name: Masterpon, I have question.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0002
rows.name:
Being eager to learn is
a good thing, meh.
I'll answer anything for you.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0003
rows.name:
The Cloud Sea is clearly 
visible from here...

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0004
rows.name:
Height of Cloud Sea is different at
different times. Why height change?

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0005
rows.name:
Meh-meh?!
W-well, um...

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0006
rows.name: Tora let Boss answer that one!

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0007
rows.name: Rex, why cloud height change?

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0008
rows.name: Well, let's see now...

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0009
rows.name:
As you can probably see, the
Cloud Sea isn't made out of water.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0010
rows.name:
So its surface isn't always
completely flat.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0011
rows.name:
Maybe it's easier if you compare it
to the clouds in the sky. They come
in all different shapes, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0012
rows.name:
Some clouds very flat...
Other clouds big and fluffy!

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0013
rows.name: Yep, that's what I mean.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0014
rows.name:
And the shape doesn't stay
the same forever.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0015
rows.name:
The Cloud Sea is the same way.
It's not always a flat surface,
sometimes it gets...fluffed up.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0016
rows.name:
The height and shape of it isn't
constant.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0017
rows.name:
It's always changing. Not suddenly,
like the weather, but gradually.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0018
rows.name:
It's more likely than not
to change overnight.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0019
rows.name: Yeah. That sounds about right.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0020
rows.name: I see.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0021
rows.name:
Oh, but it's only the Divine Beasts
like this one and the Superbia Divine Beast that
affect the Cloud Sea's height.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0022
rows.name:
Ones like the Trade Guild Divine Beast
Goldmund just float on the surface,
so they don't affect it.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0023
rows.name: Makes lots of sense!

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0024
rows.name:
I guess that's about the extent
of what I know.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0025
rows.name:
Very much thanks, Rex.
Hana learn a lot!

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0026
rows.name:
Rex must know lots of things.
Hana have even more questions to ask!

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0027
rows.name:
Uh, really? I don't know if I can
answer everything...

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0028
rows.name: Hana...

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0029
rows.name: What me say to Hana?

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0030
rows.name: Should not bother Boss too much!

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0031
rows.name: Try ask Byakko instead!

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0101
rows.name: Hmmm... Okay then.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0102
rows.name: Hana leave questions there for now.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0103
rows.name: Thanks, Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0104
rows.name:
I know quite a lot about the Cloud Sea
because of my salvaging work, but I'm
not so hot on general knowledge.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0105
rows.name:
I probably wouldn't have been
able to answer anything else...

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0106
rows.name: Don't worry, Rex.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0107
rows.name:
If you don't know the answer, there's
always a chance that I will!

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0108
rows.name: Thanks, Homura.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0109
rows.name:
And if even I don't know, we can
still fall back on Seiryuu-san.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0110
rows.name:
True enough. I've been around for quite
a while, so I could most likely answer
any questions Hana might have.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0111
rows.name:
And there's Byakko as well.
Between us, I'm sure we could find
an answer to most questions.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0112
rows.name:
You're not wrong there.
If all of us work together, we can
figure out pretty much anything!

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0113
rows.name:
I guess it's not just battle where
teamwork is important!

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0114
rows.name: Yeah!

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0201
rows.name:
That's a good idea. I reckon Byakko
is more knowledgeable than I am.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0202
rows.name:
Oh, you flatter me.
I'm no expert 
compared to our resident Divine Beast.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0203
rows.name: Wha- Don't drag me into this!

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0204
rows.name:
I have no memories of the time before
I bonded with my lady, after all.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0205
rows.name:
That's no reason to throw me
into the cooking pot!

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0206
rows.name:
What am I supposed to say if Hana
asks "Where do babies come from?"
or something like that?!

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0207
rows.name:
Tell her they are delivered
by a flying Tirkin.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0208
rows.name:
That kind of quick thinking is why
you're a better man for the job.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0209
rows.name: I couldn't possibly.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0210
rows.name:
Still, if the mighty Divine Beast is 
not willing, I suppose we will have 
to rely on my lady instead.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0211
rows.name:
Hoooold it, Byakko.
I want no part in this mess!

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0212
rows.name:
Masterpon, Hana think Hana
already learn something.

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0213
rows.name: Learn what?

rows.label: kizunatalk005_msg0214
rows.name:
This is what they 
call "passing the buck".
It was educational.
